channel.title: Bailey Burnsed
channel.description: A blog about a Aspie Nerd/FullStack Developer.

item.title: Projects
item.description:
Note - I am always programming and not all the projects are in the final state, actualy I do not think any are.

Make A Wish - Infinit Wish Board

I am curently Contributing to the Make A Wish, Infinit Wish Board Project.

It is a MERN Stack application and I am curntly installing Helment.js for securenty. Helment.js is a framework that is ment to prevent code and command injection attacks, very important in the world we live in.

Theyâ€™re responsive, and well-proportioned (in padding, line-height, margin, and font-size).

item.title: Welcome
item.description:
Welcome to My Blog,

This is my Personal blog, were I will be covering my adventure of becoming a full stack developer.

I am learing the MEVN(MongoDB, Express.js, Vue.js, Node.js), and the MERN(MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) tech stacks and I already am profishent at the LAMP Stack

I also will be making a Vlog of my Projects and Daily Builds, I like to automate boring task on my computer. I run a linux box and I am learning RHEL now and I configuing my I3 gaps config for more effient use of my time.

I run a Debian base Linux distros, I also have used Arch and Manjaro, Really fun, but not really good for production in my case.

The blog is made with jekyll and hosted on Firebase.

Please share my blog and Star my github projects, Thank you for your time, have a good day.
